page.title: 13GLYNN HOUSE
page.content: {Glynn House }was built between 1850 and 1890 and is situated high in the hills. Dr.Mitchell is the man who owns it. He is a scientist who does Biological Research. During the Second World War it was bombed and the roof was badly damaged. Then when Dr.Mitchell came to open a small chicken farm he employed 24 men and it took them 2 years to put the roof back together again. There used to be beautiful gardens there but they are a bit overgrown now. Just down the drive is a massive lake with trees surrounding it. Behind the house there are a couple of farm houses where gardeners live.Glynn House is not open to the public and is strictly private. There are cattle grazing around in the fields. At night the house is floodlit.
